thread.title: Elton John says Ireland abortion vote shows mindsets can change

title: Elton John says Ireland abortion vote shows mindsets can change
text:
Elton John says Ireland abortion vote shows mindsets can change 12:42pm EDT - 00:47
Elton John, on a visit to Ukraine to raise awareness about AIDS, said on Monday that Ireland's vote to liberalize the country's highly restrictive abortion laws showed how mindsets can change. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Elton John, on a visit to Ukraine to raise awareness about AIDS, said on Monday that Ireland's vote to liberalize the country's highly restrictive abortion laws showed how mindsets can change.
